clickAddPartSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.AddPartController
Depending on the data entered by the user, either a new part is added upon the user selecting the "save" button (in which they are then returned to the Main Screen), or various error messages will pop up, depending on what data is missing or is invalid.
clickAddProductSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.AddProductController
Depending on the data entered by the user, either the product is added upon the user selecting the "save" button (in which they are returned to the Main Screen), or various error messages will pop up, depending on what data is missing or invalid.

Brings user back to the Main Screen scene if they select the cancel button on the Modify Products scene.

clickModifyProductSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.ModifyProductController
Depending on the data entered by the user, either the product is modified upon the user selecting the save button (in which they are returned to the Main Screen scene), or various error messages will pop up, depending on what data is missing or is invalid.
clickOutsourcedRadioButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.AddPartController
Depending on whether the inHouse or outsourced radio button is selected, the corresponding text is set to either Machine ID (for in house) or Company Name (for outsourced).
clickOutsourcedRadioButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.ModifyPartController
Depending on whether outsourced or inHouse radio button is selected, Text is set to Company Name (for outsourced) or Machine ID (for in house).
clickPartAddButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.MainScreenController
When the user clicks the Add button in the Part table, the following brings up the add part scene.
clickPartDeleteButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.MainScreenController
Remove Part from Part table.
clickPartModifyButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.MainScreenController
Similar to the Add part button above, if user clicks the Modify button in the Part table, the following brings up the Modify Part scene.
clickProductAddButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.MainScreenController
When the user clicks the Modify button in the Product table, the following brings up add product scene.
clickProductDeleteButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.MainScreenController
Remove Product from Product table.
clickProductModifyButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class project.c482.MainScreenController
Similar to the Add Product button above, if user clicks the Modify button in the Product table, the following brings up the Modify Product scene.
